caption.p: (a) Tumour weight plot of negative control group, positive control group (SAHA), and I13 group; (b) inhibitory ratio plot of SAHA and I13; (c) tumour volume plot of these experimental groups (negative control, SAHA, and I13); (d) mice body weight plot of these experimental groups (negative control, SAHA, and I13). *Statistically different from control ( n = 7).
